sourcesContent:
<template>
    <canvas id="myChart"></canvas>
  </template>
  
  <script setup>
  import { onMounted } from 'vue';
  import Chart from 'chart.js/auto';
  
  onMounted(() => {
    const ctx = document.getElementById('myChart');
    new Chart(ctx, {
      type: 'line',
      data: {
        labels: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May'],
        datasets: [{
          label: 'Sales',
          data: [10, 20, 15, 30, 25],
          borderColor: 'blue',
          fill: false
        }]
      }
    });
  });
  </script>
